About Chris
Work HistoryPersonal Projects

Chris Carlson

Hello, I'm Chris Carlson, my pronouns are they/them, and I'm a Software Architect by day. In my spare time I'm a soapmaker, landscaper, pianist, and herder of tiny, whiny bio-terrorists.

non-binary

I have been using computers for as long as I can remember. I have fond memories of bedtime stories from BBS', fixing computers with pencil erasers, and power toggle switches larger than some space bars. DOS was a big deal.

Since then, I have done a little of everything in IT. I have worked in the education, news, health, law enforcement, and defense industries. My past employers include NPR and Fairfax County Public Schools.

Personal Interests

  • Hacking, tinkering, and other forms of making electronics do my bidding
  • Landscaping and gardening
  • Almost anything involving power tools
  • Music in all forms
  • Acrobatics; flying trapeze, in particular
